mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.post_time, c.p_id, a.article_id AS "article.articleId", u.nickname AS "user.nickname", u.user_id AS "user.user_id", u.photo_src AS "user.photo_src", u.url AS "user.url" FROM t_comment c, t_article a, t_user u WHERE c.article_id = a.article_id AND u.user_id = c.user_id AND c.article_id = #{id} order by c.post_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (content, article_id, p_id,user_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{article.articleId}, #{pId},#{user.userId})
